Sentencas: We report multimodal scanning hard x-ray imaging with spatial resolution approaching 10 nm and its application to contemporary studies in the field of material science.
Titulo: Multimodal hard x-ray imaging with resolution approaching 10 nm for studies in material science

Sentencas: The high spatial resolution is achieved by focusing hard x-rays with two crossed multilayer Laue lenses and raster-scanning a sample with respect to the nanofocusing optics.
Titulo: Multimodal hard x-ray imaging with resolution approaching 10 nm for studies in material science

Sentencas: Various techniques are used to characterize and verify the achieved focus size and imaging resolution.
Titulo: Multimodal hard x-ray imaging with resolution approaching 10 nm for studies in material science

Sentencas: The multimodal imaging is realized by utilizing simultaneously absorption-, phase-, and fluorescence-contrast mechanisms.
Titulo: Multimodal hard x-ray imaging with resolution approaching 10 nm for studies in material science

Sentencas: The combination of high spatial resolution and multimodal imaging enables a comprehensive study of a sample on a very fine length scale.
Titulo: Multimodal hard x-ray imaging with resolution approaching 10 nm for studies in material science

Sentencas: In this work, the unique multimodal imaging capability was used to investigate a mixed ionic-electronic conducting ceramic-based membrane material employed in solid oxide fuel cells and membrane separations (compound of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-x and CoFe2O4) which revealed the existence of an emergent material phase and quantified the chemical complexity at the nanoscale.
Titulo: Multimodal hard x-ray imaging with resolution approaching 10 nm for studies in material science
